text: Rafael Nadal was the defending champion, and successfully defended the title, defeating Albert Ramos Viñolas in the final, 6–1, 6–3. With the win, Nadal claimed an Open Era record 50th clay-court title as well as his 10th title at Monte Carlo, becoming the first man in the Open Era to win 10 titles at the same tournament. ==Seeds== The top eight seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky Losers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ====Fifth qualifier==== ====Sixth qualifier==== ====Seventh qualifier==== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Monte- Carlo Rolex Masters - Singles
